d:
Wanna know how to play Puyo Puyo or Tetris, but somehow don't know to to access your digital manual on Steam (or you are playing on Xbox)? Then this gallery is for you!

You too can play Puyo Puyo Tetris 2 by going to the following link:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1259790/Puyo_Puyo_Tetris_2/

Anyway, enjoy!

Chapters:
Basic Controls- 2
Title Screen- 3
Basic Rules- 4 to 7
Match Rules- 8 to 12
Adventure- 13 + 14
Solo (Arcade)- 15 + 16
Multiplayer (Arcade)- 17
Options & Data- 18 + 19
Online- 20 to 24
Lessons- 25
